publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-429.1 Des McNulty: QE2—As an amendment to motion (S3M-429) in the name of Stuart McMillan, after "at that time" insert "recognises that people who formerly worked on the QE2 are prominent in the Clydebank Asbestos Group which has successfully campaigned on issues such as securing prescription of Alimta on the NHS and ensuring the amendment of the Damages (Scotland) Act 1976; furthermore recognises that there are many work-related health issues still to be addressed". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-429.1 Des McNulty: QE2—As an amendment to motion (S3M-429) in the name of Stuart McMillan, after "at that time" insert "recognises that people who formerly worked on the QE2 are prominent in the Clydebank Asbestos Group which has successfully campaigned on issues such as securing prescription of Alimta on the NHS and ensuring the amendment of the Damages (Scotland) Act 1976; furthermore recognises that there are many work-related health issues still to be addressed".
S3M-429.1 QE2 (lodged on 18 September 2007) Duncan McNeil*
